Package hc.server.util.scheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JobCalendar
    An interface to be implemented by objects that define spaces of time during which an associated Trigger may (not) fire.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnualJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes a set of days of the year.
    CronExcludeJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes the set of times expressed by a given cron expression.
    DailyJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes (or includes - see below) a specified time range each day.
    HolidayJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar stores a list of holidays (full days that are excluded from scheduling).
    MonthlyJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes a set of days of the month.
    WeeklyJobCalendar
    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes a set of days of the week.
